subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As Carl Pavano comes to the end of his four-year contract with the Yankees, he is thrilled to be a pitcher and not a patient. But he also has wounds that are hard for him to forget.
snippet: As Carl Pavano comes to the end of his four-year contract with the Yankees, he is thrilled to be a pitcher and not a patient. But he also has wounds that are hard for him to forget.
